quiz.question: Which statement about sitting on cold concrete causing illness is true?
options: Sitting on cold concrete directly causes infections
Exposure to cold does not directly create viral infections without exposure to pathogens
Cold stone instantly weakens the immune system
quiz.answer: Exposure to cold does not directly create viral infections without exposure to pathogens

quiz.question: Which description matches Linus Pauling's vitamin C claim?
options: He discovered vitamin C cures broken bones
He promoted megadoses of vitamin C to prevent colds in the 1970s
He opposed all vitamin supplementation publicly
quiz.answer: He promoted megadoses of vitamin C to prevent colds in the 1970s

quiz.question: Which historical study influenced the myth that low-fat diets always prevent obesity?
options: Low-fat diet claims originated from astronomy research
A single 1800s study proved low-fat cures obesity
Early population studies linked fat intake and heart disease, but later research showed complexity with carbs and sugars
quiz.answer: Early population studies linked fat intake and heart disease, but later research showed complexity with carbs and sugars

quiz.question: Which claim about taking vitamin C to prevent colds is most accurate?
options: Vitamin C prevents all colds when taken daily
Vitamin C cures viral infections instantly
Regular vitamin C might slightly reduce cold duration but does not fully prevent colds
quiz.answer: Regular vitamin C might slightly reduce cold duration but does not fully prevent colds

quiz.question: Which claim about soy and hormone disruption reflects evidence?
options: Normal dietary soy causes major hormonal disruption in adults
Moderate soy consumption does not generally disrupt hormones in most adults
All soy products are endocrine disruptors
quiz.answer: Moderate soy consumption does not generally disrupt hormones in most adults

quiz.question: Which documented adverse event illustrates risks of extreme detox regimens?
options: Juice cleanses are hospital-grade therapies
Severe electrolyte imbalance and acute kidney injury have occurred after extreme juice cleanses
Detox regimens never cause medical complications
quiz.answer: Severe electrolyte imbalance and acute kidney injury have occurred after extreme juice cleanses

quiz.question: Which statement about organic produce is correct?
options: Organic means nutritionally identical in every case
Organic produce contains no pesticides at all
Organic produce can have residues but typically fewer synthetic pesticides
quiz.answer: Organic produce can have residues but typically fewer synthetic pesticides

quiz.question: Which evidence-based claim about low-fat diets and heart health is accurate?
options: All low-fat diets reduce heart disease risk regardless of food type
Replacing saturated fats with refined carbs may not improve heart health
Low-fat packaged foods always lower heart disease risk
quiz.answer: Replacing saturated fats with refined carbs may not improve heart health

quiz.question: Which epidemiological observation challenges the 'sugar causes diabetes' simplification?
options: Sugar intake has zero correlation with metabolic health
Type 2 diabetes risk links to overall calories, obesity, and genetics, not sugar alone
Only sugar directly causes all diabetes cases
quiz.answer: Type 2 diabetes risk links to overall calories, obesity, and genetics, not sugar alone

quiz.question: Which statement about sugar and hyperactivity in children reflects evidence?
options: Sugar directly causes hyperactivity in most children
Sugar permanently changes brain chemistry in kids
Sugar rarely causes measurable hyperactivity

quiz.question: Which myth about cell phone radiation and cancer aligns with major agency findings?
options: Research has not established a consistent causal link between typical phone use and cancer
Phones instantly mutate DNA on contact
Cell phone use has been conclusively shown to cause cancer
quiz.answer: Research has not established a consistent causal link between typical phone use and cancer

quiz.question: Which nuanced claim about saturated fat and heart disease aligns with recent meta-analyses?
options: Saturated fat always reduces heart disease risk
All saturated fat is harmless in every diet
Replacing saturated fat with polyunsaturated fat lowers heart disease risk; replacing it with refined carbs may not
quiz.answer: Replacing saturated fat with polyunsaturated fat lowers heart disease risk; replacing it with refined carbs may not

quiz.question: Which belief about antibiotics treating colds is accurate?
options: Antibiotics boost immunity instantly
Antibiotics cure all colds and flu
Antibiotics treat bacterial infections, not typical viral colds
quiz.answer: Antibiotics treat bacterial infections, not typical viral colds

quiz.question: Which statement about simulated 'natural' childbirth benefits reflects evidence?
options: All home births are safer than hospital births in every situation
Hospital births always cause harm to mothers
Planned home births can be safe for low-risk pregnancies with proper backup plans
quiz.answer: Planned home births can be safe for low-risk pregnancies with proper backup plans

options: Grapefruit inhibits intestinal CYP3A4, raising levels of some statins and increasing side-effect risk
Grapefruit enhances liver clearance of all medications
Grapefruit neutralizes statins entirely by binding them chemically
